data.name: Dejar Ir - A Pandemic Soulful Tale
data.detailed_description:
DEJAR IR tells a unique story harnessing some of the emotions that emerged at the beginning of the pandemic.

This emotional journey through the eyes of artist MJR de la Torre, spans numerous colorful settings divided into worlds that will make you want to relive, escape and accept your own reality in these current times.

Uncertainty, memories and hope are some of the signs that will help you interpret the reality of the game, and life itself, in your very own way. You might even go as far as to rediscover who you are and where you are…

The islands, spaces, music and goals of the game will immerse you in an adventure filled with emotions, the very emotions we experienced when COVID times were at their peak.

BULLET POINTS
  • A dystopian world with real spaces and works of art which mirror the feelings of madness and longing that we experienced during the pandemic
  • Different puzzles in dream-like settings expressed through paintings where the main character is the artist
  • Narrative with a psychopoetic feel
  • 4 feelings in imaginary worlds where emotions in the game will gradually transform into metaphors of our experiences
  • A unique experience in extraordinary and lively environments
  • Inspired by the works of artist MJR de la Torre

data.short_description: DEJAR IR is an intimate and sentimental game where the story is told through different works of art that evoke what we felt during the pandemic, culminating with one of the most beautiful feelings. What will it be? An adventure filled with emotions we experienced during the pandemic.
